name: Oak
description: A common tree in the northern hemisphere, known for its strength and longevity.

name: Pine
description: A coniferous tree, widespread in the northern hemisphere.

name: Maple
description: A genus of trees and shrubs commonly known as maples.

name: Willow
description: A genus of deciduous trees and shrubs, found primarily on moist soils in cold and temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere.
